amendment.description: To provide for additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation and to provide for a program of temporary enhanced regular unemployment compensation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 544 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 544 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 152.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 544.

Amendment SA 544 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6180-6188) To provide for additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation and to provide for a program of temporary enhanced regular unemployment compensation, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 544 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 152.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 544 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
